channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly posting rubbish on Keep left sign, 29th August
item.description:
On the Keep Left sign on the island of Cray valley road at the junction of Cray Avenue someone has stuck a sign with dribble on it. Please remove
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Valley Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ply area and estate need cleaning, 29th August
item.description:
The play area hasn’t been cleaned in weeks, even though reported several times. Please clean today.

item.title: Massive black sofa dumped in alleyway, 29th August
item.description:
Massive black sofa dumped in alley owned by council (part of council block of flats) opposite 181 consort road Please remove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, Consort Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing drain in car park, 29th August
item.description:
The main drain in Peabody's carpark is blocked and overflows every time it rains flooding the car park. This has been reported before. Note this is Peabody owned and maintained private land, Peabody actively maintains it, earlier this week they were power washing paint off the car park surface into the drain, so this is very definitely Peabody's responsibility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Reach, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This road sign is about three years out of date and needs removing please, 29th August
item.description:
Out of date sign. Unnecessary street clutter. WhatThreeWords location is ///fires.chase.eating

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Streatham Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 8 Lambs Conduit Passage, 29th August
item.description:
Street light out for one more abouve 8 Lambs Conduit Passage next to Henry Herbert Tailors. Also, light out on Lambs Coduit Passage next to trees and on the side of Henry Herbert Tailors. Also, lights out below the three trees on the passageway. Same problem as a few months back, was repaired and then problem returned. Very dark at night and potentially dangerous for walkers
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Lambs Conduit Passage, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bulb Out, 29th August
item.description:
New Cross Road by Station Green Light is not working

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 262, New Cross Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes all along Masons Hill, 29th August
item.description:
All the way from the Kentish Way-Masons Hill junction to Homesdale Road, there are several potholes and large lumps on the southbound carriage leading to cyclists having to veer into the middle of the road. There is a large lump in the tarmac near the pedestrian crossing which could be dangerous for crossing pedestrians too. These have been there for months, if not years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 117-119, Masons Hill, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin hasnt been enptied since building work started at Birkbeck, 29th August
item.description:
Bins overflowing, rubbish all over the pavements and road , rotting food and bags of dog mess , foxes ripping bags open and rats , bins haven't been cleared since building work started at birkbeck tram stop .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken pavements, tipping up and down, trip hazard., 29th August
item.description:
Broken pavement for several weeks, at entry to my driveway. Noticed white paint marks - assume via council but no action. My wife has cancer and I don’t want a fall or to the public in general - also impacts on driving car on and off driveway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Gourock Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
